lead_paragraph: O'CONNOR--Reverend Monsignor Robert B.,85, beloved son of the late Bartholomew and Catherine, passed away peacefully April 20th. Msgr. O'Connor retired recently from Blessed Sacrament in Manhattan after 30 years as beloved pastor. Msgr. O'Connor is survived by his brothers John (Catherine) and William (Anne), as well as a large extended family. He was predeceased by his sister, Kathleen. Visitation will be Saturday, April 23rd, 2-4pm and 7-9pm at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 81st St. and Madison Ave. Monsignor O'Connor will lie in state beginning at 3pm Sunday at Blessed Sacrament Church, 152 W. 71st St. A Parish Mass will be celebrated Sunday, April 24th at 5:30pm at Blessed Sacrament Church. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated Monday, April 25th at 10 am at Blessed Sacrament Church followed by Interment at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. In lieu of flowers, please make donations to Catholic Relief Services or the charity of your choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  O'CONNOR, REVEREND MONSIGNOR ROBERT B.
